lines.gurmukhi: bys√çw ky isMgwr ibBcwr ko n pwrwvwr ibn Brqwr nwir kw kI kY bulweIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Baysvaa Kay Singaar Bibhachaar Ko N Paaraavaara , Bin Bharataar Naari Kaa Kee Kai Bulaaeeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: For immoral acts, there is no end for a whore to do up her ornamentation and embellishment. But without a husband, whose wife would she be called as?

lines.gurmukhi: bg syq gwq jIv Gwq kir Kwq kyqy mon ghy pRXwnw Dry jugq n pweIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Bag Sayt Gaat Jeev Ghaat Kari Khaat Kaytay , Mon Gahay Pyaanaa Dharay Jougat N Paaeeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The looks of a heron are like that of a swan but it kills many living beings to eat them up. He silently sits in contemplation but such contemplation cannot reach one to the Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: fwNf kI fMfweI burvweI n kihq AwvY Aiq hI iFTweI sukucq n ljweIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Daand Kee Dandaaee Buravaaee N Kahit Aavai , Ati Hee Ddhitthaaee Soukouchat N Lajaaeeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The shameless words and foul acts of a Bhand (low caste persons who entertain people on their happy functions) are beyond description. Due to their extreme impudence, they never feel shy of saying and doing anything.

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy pr qn Dn dUKnw qiRdyK mm piqq Anyk eyk rom n pujweIAY ]641]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Par Tan Dhan Dookhanaa Tridaykh Mama , Patit Anayk Ayk Rom N Pujaaeeai ?641?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly, like the incurable and deadly disease, I am infested with the ailments of looking at other's woman, other's wealth and slander. Sins of every hair of my body are more intense than the myriad sins of many sinners.
